sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY PROD_OFFER_ID DESC ) rn , newtab.* FROM ( SELECT A.PROD_OFFER_ID PROD_OFFER_ID ,A.PROD_OFFER_NAME PROD_OFFER_NAME,A.STATUS_CD STATUS_CD,A.PROD_OFFER_DESC PROD_OFFER_DESC FROM PROD_OFFER A
A.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID=#orgId# A.PROD_OFFER_NAME LIKE '%'||#prodOfferName#||'%'
AND A.STATUS_CD != '1300' AND A.COOPERATION_TYPE != '13' AND A.tenant_id=#tenantId# ) newtab ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #pro# AND #end#

SELECT COUNT(1) ALLNUM FROM PROD_OFFER A
A.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID=#orgId# A.PROD_OFFER_NAME LIKE '%'||#prodOfferName#||'%'
AND A.STATUS_CD != '1300' AND A.COOPERATION_TYPE != '13' AND A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT D.SERVICE_ID SERVICE_ID, D.SERVICE_CN_NAME SERVICE_CN_NAME ,D.SERVICE_EN_NAME SERVICE_EN_NAME,A.COMPONENT_ID COMPONENT_ID FROM COMPONENT A,TECH_IMPL B,SER_TECH_IMPL C,SERVICE D
A.ORG_ID=#orgId# D.SERVICE_ID=#serviceId#
AND C.STATE NOT IN ('X','G','C') AND A.COMPONENT_ID = B.COMPONENT_ID AND B.TECH_IMPL_ID = C.TECH_IMPL_ID AND C.SERVICE_ID = D.SERVICE_ID AND A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT a. PROC_MODE_ATTR_ID, a.FORMAT, a.ATTR_SPEC_ID, a.ATTR_SPEC_NAME,a.PROC_MODE_ID FROM (SELECT B.PROC_MODE_ATTR_ID PROC_MODE_ATTR_ID, A.FORMAT FORMAT, C.ATTR_SPEC_ID ATTR_SPEC_ID, C.ATTR_SPEC_NAME ATTR_SPEC_NAME, A.PROC_MODE_ID PROC_MODE_ID FROM PROC_MODE A, PROC_MODE_ATTR B, ATTR_SPEC C
A.PROC_MODE_ID=#procModeId#
AND A.PROC_MODE_ID = B.PROC_MODE_ID AND B.ATTR_SPEC_ID = C.ATTR_SPEC_ID AND A.STATUS_CD = '10' AND A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# ORDER BY B.PROC_MODE_SEQ) a

SELECT A.PROC_MODE_ATTR_ID PROC_MODE_ATTR_ID, C.ATTR_VALUE_NAME ATTR_VALUE_NAME, C.attr_value_id ATTR_VALUE_ID, b.proc_mode_value_id PROC_MODE_VALUE_ID FROM PROC_MODE_ATTR A, PROC_MODE_ATTR_VALUE B, ATTR_VALUE C WHERE A.PROC_MODE_ATTR_ID = B.PROC_MODE_ATTR_ID AND B.ATTR_VALUE_ID = C.ATTR_VALUE_ID AND A.PROC_MODE_ATTR_ID=#procModeAttrId# AND A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT A.PRICING_INFO_ID PRICING_INFO_ID, A.PROC_MODE_INST_ID PROC_MODE_INST_ID, B.PROC_MODE_DESC PROC_MODE_DESC FROM PRICING_PLAN_2_PROC_MODE_INST A, PROC_MODE_INST B WHERE A.PROC_MODE_INST_ID = B.PROC_MODE_INST_ID AND B.STATUS_CD = '10' AND A.RELA_TYPE = #relaType# AND A.PRICING_INFO_ID = #pricingInfoId# ND A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# ORDER BY A.SEQ_ID ASC

SELECT D.NAME NAME,F.PROC_MODE_DESC EXPLAIN from PROD_OFFER A , PROD_OFFER_PRICING B , PRICING_PLAN C , PRICING_CLASSIFY D ,PRICING_PLAN_2_PROC_MODE_INST E , PROC_MODE_INST F WHERE A.PROD_OFFER_ID = B.PROD_OFFER_ID and B.PRICING_INFO_ID = C.PRICING_INFO_ID and C.PRICING_CLASSIFY = D.CD and C.PRICING_INFO_ID = E.PRICING_INFO_ID and F.PROC_MODE_INST_ID = E.PROC_MODE_INST_ID AND A.PROD_OFFER_ID=#offerId# AND A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND E.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND F.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY PROD_OFFER_ID DESC ) rn , newtab.* FROM ( SELECT A.PROD_OFFER_ID,A.PROD_OFFER_NAME,A.STATUS_CD,A.PROD_OFFER_DESC,A.LOGO_FILE_ID FROM PROD_OFFER A WHERE A.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID=#ORG_ID# AND A.STATUS_CD != '1300' AND A.COOPERATION_TYPE = #COOPERATION_TYPE# ) newtab ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #BEGIN# AND #END#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY PROD_OFFER_ID DESC ) rn , newtab.* FROM ( SELECT T.PROD_OFFER_ID, T.PROD_OFFER_NAME, T.OFFER_NBR, A.NAME, T.PROD_OFFER_DESC, TT.STATUS_CD, T.LOGO_FILE_ID FROM PROD_OFFER T,PROD_OFFER_CHANNEL TT, CHANNEL TTT, PROD_OFFER_CHANNEL_TYPE TTTT, ORG A WHERE T.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID = #ORG_ID# AND T.PROD_OFFER_ID = TT.PROD_OFFER_ID AND TT.CHANNEL_ID = TTT.CHANNEL_ID AND TT.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND TTT.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND T.PROD_OFFER_ID = TTTT.PROD_OFFER_ID AND TTTT.CHANNEL_TYPE = '20' AND T.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID = A.ORG_ID AND T.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND T.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND TT.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND TTT.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND TTTT.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# ) newtab ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #BEGIN# AND #PROD_END#

select c.PRODUCT_ATTR_ID as productAttrId, c.DEFAULT_VALUE as defaultValue, c.ATTR_SPEC_ID as attrSpecId from PRODUCT_ATTR c where c.product_attr_id in( select b.product_attr_id from PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP_RELA b where b.product_attr_group_id=#productAttrGroupId# ) and c.attr_spec_id=#attrSpecId#
select m.attr_desc as attrDesc from ATTR_VALUE m ,PROD_ATTR_VALUE n where m.attr_value_id = n.attr_value_id and n.product_attr_id=#productAttrId#
select a.EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID as extProdOfferId from prod_offer a where a.EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID=#extProdOfferId#
select * from PRODUCT a where a.product_id=#productId#

select * from OFFER_PROD_REL, OFFER_PROD_REL_PRICING, PRICING_PLAN,PRICING_PLAN_CLASSIFY_REL,PRICING_CLASSIFY where OFFER_PROD_REL.OFFER_PROD_RELA_ID = OFFER_PROD_REL_PRICING.OFFER_PROD_RELA_ID and OFFER_PROD_REL_PRICING.PRICING_INFO_ID=PRICING_PLAN.PRICING_INFO_ID and PRICING_PLAN.PRICING_INFO_ID=PRICING_PLAN_CLASSIFY_REL.PRICING_INFO_ID and PRICING_PLAN_CLASSIFY_REL.PRICING_CLASSIFY=PRICING_CLASSIFY.CD and OFFER_PROD_REL.PROD_OFFER_ID=#prodOfferId# and OFFER_PROD_REL.tenant_id=#tenantId# and OFFER_PROD_REL_PRICING.tenant_id=#tenantId# and PRICING_PLAN.tenant_id=#tenantId# and PRICING_PLAN_CLASSIFY_REL.tenant_id=#tenantId# and PRICING_CLASSIFY.tenant_id=#tenantId#
